text: Ben Dreith (born February 1, 1925)Happy belated birthday to Ben Dreith (FootballZebras.com) is a former American professional football on-field official. He worked from 1960 to 1969 in the American Football League (AFL) and from 1970 to 1990 in the NFL. He was a three-sport athlete at the University of Northern Colorado. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:Sportspeople from Colorado Category:Living people
title: Ben Dreith
